snippet.title: 8-Bit Adventures 2 - Official Trailer | gamescom 2020
snippet.description:
Return to a time of strategic turn-based battles, deep party customization, and a large fantastical world traversed by airship in the latest trailer for Critical Games' ode to NES, SNES, and PS1-era JRPGs. 

Play the free demo on the 8-Bit Adventures 2 Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/733110/8Bit_Adventures_2/
Listen to more samples from the game’s soundtrack on SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/8bitadventures2

Thanks for checking out gamescom 2020 on IGN. Be sure to visit IGN from August 27th through August 30th for the daily gamescom 2020 stream to check out shows like gamescom Opening Night Live, gamescom Awesome Indies, gamescom Cosplay Contest, and gamescom Best of show. And for gamescom 2020 highlights, IGN will have them all. Throughout gamescom2020,  we’ll be dropping new gamescom announcements, gamescom reveals, and gamescom trailers you don’t want to miss.

#ign #gamescom
